attributes.action: To make getting the covid vaccine a choice and covid passports non mandatory.
attributes.additional_details: It’s destroying peoples life’s people are being basically forced and are depressed with the way life is right now I don’t want the vaccine and it should be my choice I shouldn’t be punished to not be allowed in nightclubs, pubs, holidays and living a normal life it’s not fair at all and I want that to be put a stop too there’s so many known side affects already never mind the unknown side affects to come.
attributes.background: To change the rules about covid passports and being basically forced to take the covid vaccine when I don’t want too. I want it to be changed to it being everyone’s own choice whether they want to get the vaccine or not and no punishment to come from it.
